#summary Documentation for users.

= Introduction =

This page includes everything that users need to know to use Monarch productively.


= Installation =

In order to install and use Monarch you need the [http://get.adobe.com/air/ Adobe AIR runtime]. You will then be able to install our application using the installer available under [http://code.google.com/p/monarch-flex/downloads/list downloads].
